articles.description: Updated statistics from NHS England come as Prime Minister Boris Johnson remains in hospital after going in for tests last night because he has had a fever for 10 days.
articles.content:

articles.title: Mexico registers 2,143 coronavirus cases, 94 deaths - National Post
articles.description: MEXICO CITY — Mexico on Sunday had registered 2,143 cases of the novel coronavirus in the country, an increase of 253 cases from a day earlier, the health ministry said.The number of deaths l…
articles.content:
MEXICO CITY — Mexico on Sunday had registered 2,143 cases of the novel coronavirus in the country, an increase of 253 cases from a day earlier, the health ministry said.
The number of deaths linked to the virus rose by 15 to 94. (Reporting by Drazen Jorgic)
